featured.text: A group in the UK even started a website devoted to “beating Blue Monday.”
The moral lesson is that 33 and consistent will always beat slow and steady.
No one could beat Paul at running.
Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops.

definition.en_def: to strike or hit repeatedly; to defeat someone in a game or competition; a rhythmic unit in music.
definition.example: She can beat the drums perfectly in time with the music.
